name: shapefile
description: An implementation of the shapefile (.shp) spatial data format.

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup -f cjs -g slice-source:sources.slice -o dist/shapefile.node.js -- shapefile/index.js && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g path-source:sources.path,slice-source:sources.slice -n shapefile -o dist/shapefile.js -- index.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" -o dist/shapefile.min.js -cm -- dist/shapefile.js
